error: The default value uses "get_node()", "$", or "%" which won't return nodes in the scene tree before "_ready()" is called. Use the "@onready" annotation to solve this.
aliases: The default value uses "get_node()" which won't return nodes in the scene tree before "_ready()" is called. Use the "@onready" annotation to solve this.
The default value uses "$" which won't return nodes in the scene tree before "_ready()" is called. Use the "@onready" annotation to solve this.
The default value uses "%" which won't return nodes in the scene tree before "_ready()" is called. Use the "@onready" annotation to solve this.
meaning: The user attempted to assign the default value of a property to a node in the scene tree using a reference to the scene tree, before it is set up.
causes: The "@onready" annotation is not included before the property declaration attempting to reference the scene tree.
fixes: Add the "@onready" annotation to the beginning of the line.
